item.title: Buying ban apeal
item.dc:creator: @alexia alexia
item.description:
@alexia wrote:

"Dear Jagex,
I just wanted to let you know that I am on to your little scheme… I know what you are trying to do by supposedly ‘banning’ all of these accounts. You are just using them for yourself! That is against the rules, my oh-so-powerful friend. I promise you that if you don’t give my account back, I will report you to Andrew himself, and you will all be banned.

Sincareeelie,

  • Yourname"

I typed that up in 30 seconds.

-Alexia

Read full topic

item.title: Buying ban apeal
item.dc:creator: @gander gander
item.description:
@gander wrote:

Hey jageX!!!

Andrew gower is a cock sucking nooblet

Oh and btw theres a easy way to by pass there fucked up the ass support team…

Step 1.

Wait a few weeks

Step 2.

Get a different ip

Step 3.

Do an account recovery … say u lost ur password…
Recover it

Step 4.

Try and log on (it will say ur banned)

Step 5.

Send a complaint saying (WTF i been away for 2 weeks and my account is banned??? what did i do ??? )

Step 6.

Your unbanned …

Congrats jagex your fucking pwnt

item.title: Buying ban apeal

item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

You can actaully get your account back if they say it’s final. I stupidly tried to sell my account and it went wrong… 9 Months later of trying to tell jagex that I was hacked and I get it back. ^^

Read full topic

item.title: Buying ban apeal
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

To any Jagex Staff member who comes to read this, I am here to admit that, yes… I did cheat… yes I understand I was wrong for cheating… I truly have thought about not only the consequences you have set upon the account I am appealing, but also the actions I did which caused such the punishment, yes I did trade items from one account to another one, but not with intent of RW-Trade, I’m Sorry.

I just used that to try to get my main back… it was great perfectly neat, grammatically correct, well written and yet it all fit perfect…right to the last period… and I even landed perfectly on 0 char(s) left to type with :)[br][size=1]Posted at: May 12, 2006, 09:57:20 am[/size][hr]Sorry for double post but I got this back… not even 10 seconds later… o.O…

From: Jagex
Subject: Re: Your Recent RuneScape Query
Date: 12 May 2006 18:41
Delete

Hi L3etal3lade,

I am sorry to say that your ban appeal has not been successful.

This decision is final and any further ban appeals will not be considered.

Sincerely,
RuneScape Customer Support

Read full topic

item.title: Buying ban apeal
item.dc:creator: @BlackThursday BlackThursday
item.description:
@BlackThursday wrote:

For years all i have been playing is runescape, it helps me get through the pressures of life. Without Runescape I feel like I am empty with nothing to live for. Since you banned my account I have been disagnosed with clinical depression and am teetering closely to the edge.

I thought i could be OK but a few days ago i was in my kitchen cutting up vetables (sic spelling). I wanted to go play Runescape but then I remebered my ban… I was so close to cutting my wrists I cried.

You must help me Jagex, I don’t know why you banned my account and why this is happening to me but you’ve made a mistake. I poured my heart and soul into that account and you took it away from me. Please help me try to regain my emotional stability again. Runescape kept me level- headed and I would like to expirience that again.

Thank you for your time and great game,
insert username here

Try that and tell me how it works out

Read full topic
